CustomField.description: Formula field which calculates the amount of days the Opportunity has been in the Qualification stage by subtracting Planning date from Qualification date OR todayâ€™s date from the Identification date (if Planning stage has not yet been reached)
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(SRM_PP_PlanningDate__c), TODAY() - SRM_PP_QualificationDate__c, SRM_PP_PlanningDate__c - SRM_PP_QualificationDate__c)
CustomField.label: Days in Qualification Stage
